Trigger.name: Show Damage Trigger
Trigger.script:
totalDamage = 0 local landedAttacks = matches[3] local totalAttacks = matches[4] local damage = matches[7]
if landedAttacks ~= "" then totalDamage = tonumber(damage) * tonumber(landedAttacks) else totalDamage = tonumber(damage) end
moveCursor(0, getLineNumber()) insertText("[ " .. totalDamage .. " ] ") moveCursorEnd()

Trigger.name: Tell Trigger
Trigger.script: --local name = matches[2]:sub(2) --local msg = matches[3] --local str = "<yellow>"..name.." tells you<gray>, '"..msg.."'" --CaptureChat(str) CaptureChat()

regexCodeList.string: tells you,

Trigger.name: Open Door Trigger
Trigger.script:
dir = matches[4] or "" doorName = matches[3] or ""
if matches[2] == "lock" or matches[2] == "unlock" then status = "locked" else status = "closed" end if Map.mapping then Map.OpenedDoor(dir, doorName, status, "no") end

Trigger.name: Tab Trigger
Trigger.script: local text = line local pos = selectString("\t",1) while pos ~= -1 do replace(string.rep(" ",8 - math.fmod(pos,8))) pos = selectString("\t",1) end

Trigger.script: if Bot.active then Bot.playerInRoom = true end

Trigger.name: Normal Prompt Trigger
Pool Trigger
Trigger.script:
Player.lastHp = Player.hp Player.hp = tonumber(matches[2]) Player.hpMax = tonumber(matches[3])
Player.mp = tonumber(matches[4]) Player.mpMax = tonumber(matches[5])
Player.sp = tonumber(matches[6]) Player.spMax = tonumber(matches[7])
Player.ep = tonumber(matches[8]) Player.epMax = tonumber(matches[9])
Player.hpp = Player.hp / Player.hpMax Player.mpp = Player.mp / Player.mpMax Player.spp = Player.sp / Player.spMax Player.epp = Player.ep / Player.epMax Player.pp = Player.hpp + Player.mpp + Player.spp + Player.epp
if (Player.hpp < .3) and (Player.position == "fight") then -- todo fill this in end
if Bot.active then if Player.hpp < 0.3 then if not Flag.setRecallHandler then Flag.setRecallHandler = true registerAnonymousEventHandler("onRecall", "DoRecovery", true) end expandAlias('recall') end end
raiseEvent("onPoolPrompt")

Trigger.name: Combat Prompt Trigger
Trigger.script:
matches=multimatches[1] Player.fight.tank = matches[2] Player.fight.tankCondition = matches[3] Player.fight.target = matches[4] Player.fight.targetCondition = matches[5] Player.lag = tonumber(matches[6]) Player.position = "fight"
if Player.fight.sawAttacks then Player.fight.round = Player.fight.round + 1 Player.fight.sawAttacks = false end
raiseEvent("onCombatPrompt")

Trigger.name: Natural Attunement Trigger
Trigger.script: Player.illum = tonumber(matches[2]) Player.satio = tonumber(matches[3]) Player.lif = tonumber(matches[4])

Trigger.name: Craft Moving Component Trigger
Trigger.script: local get = string.trim(matches[2]) local amount = tonumber(matches[3]) or 1 local t = string.trim(matches[4]) local name = string.trim(matches[7]) local bag = string.trim(matches[8]) or false if get == "get" and bag then Craft.SawGet(amount, t, name) elseif get == "get" and not bag then Craft.MoveComp(amount, t, name) elseif get == "put" and bag then Craft.SawPut(amount, t, name) else Craft.MoveComp(-amount, t, name) end

regexCodeList.string: ^You (get|put|give|drop) \(?(\d+)?\)? ?< (gemstone|scraps|component) > an? (shred|stalk|cut|nugget|layer|plank|bolt|ingot|handful)?( of )?([\w\s-']+?)( to .*| from .*| inside .*)?\.$

Trigger.name: Craft Sitting Component Trigger
Trigger.script: local amount = tonumber(matches[3]) or 1 local t = string.trim(matches[4]) local name = string.trim(matches[7]) Craft.SawComp(amount, t, name)

Trigger.name: Ninja Pool Trigger
Trigger.script:
Player.lastHp = Player.hp Player.hp = tonumber(matches[2]) Player.hpMax = tonumber(matches[3])
Player.mp = tonumber(matches[4]) Player.mpMax = tonumber(matches[5])
Player.sp = tonumber(matches[6]) Player.spMax = tonumber(matches[7])
Player.ep = tonumber(matches[8]) Player.epMax = tonumber(matches[9])
Player.hpp = Player.hp / Player.hpMax Player.mpp = Player.mp / Player.mpMax Player.spp = Player.sp / Player.spMax Player.epp = Player.ep / Player.epMax Player.pp = Player.hpp + Player.mpp + Player.spp + Player.epp
if (Player.hpp < .3) and (Player.position == "fight") then -- todo fill this in end
if Bot.active then if Player.hpp < 0.3 then if not Flag.setRecallHandler then Flag.setRecallHandler = true registerAnonymousEventHandler("onRecall", "DoRecovery", true) end expandAlias('recall') end end
raiseEvent("onPoolPrompt")

Trigger.name: Paladin Pool Trigger
Trigger.script:
Player.lastHp = Player.hp Player.hp = tonumber(matches[2]) Player.hpMax = tonumber(matches[3])
Player.mp = tonumber(matches[4]) Player.mpMax = tonumber(matches[5])
Player.sp = tonumber(matches[6]) Player.spMax = tonumber(matches[7])
Player.ep = tonumber(matches[8]) Player.epMax = tonumber(matches[9])
Player.hpp = Player.hp / Player.hpMax Player.mpp = Player.mp / Player.mpMax Player.spp = Player.sp / Player.spMax Player.epp = Player.ep / Player.epMax Player.pp = Player.hpp + Player.mpp + Player.spp + Player.epp
if (Player.hpp < .99) and (Player.position ~= "sleep") then DoAbility(Player.buff_queue, "lay hands") end
if (Player.hpp < .3) and (Player.position == "fight") then AddAttack("barrier behest") AddAttack("healing radiance") end
if (Player.spp < .5) and (Player.position ~= "sleep") then DoAbility(Player.buff_queue, "deific amelioration") end
if ((Player.spp < .75) or (Player.hpp < .95)) and (Player.position ~= "sleep") and (Player.position ~= "rest") then DoAbility(Player.buff_queue, "decree of innocence") end
if Bot.active then if Player.hpp < 0.3 then if not Flag.setRecallHandler then Flag.setRecallHandler = true registerAnonymousEventHandler("onRecall", "DoRecovery", true) end expandAlias('recall') end end
--if (Player.align < 1000) and (Player.position ~= "fight") then --DoAbility(Player.buff_queue, "radiance of atonement") --end
raiseEvent("onPoolPrompt")

Trigger.name: Druid Convert Gold Trigger

You convert all your gold into platinum.

Trigger.name: Trainer Missing
Trigger.script: if (Bot.state == "training") and (not Flag.trainingFlag) then Flag.trainingFlag = true expandAlias("go sylvia") send("conv 9") send("conv 5") tempTimer(5, [[Flag.trainingFlag = false]], false) end

regexCodeList.string: Only trainers can perform conversions. You must find one.

Trigger.name: Recall Player Fight Trigger
Trigger.script: Flag.inPlayerFight = true if Bot.active and not Flag.setPFightHandler then Flag.setPFightHandler = true Bot.Stop() registerAnonymousEventHandler("onPrompt", function() expandAlias("recall") end, true) end

regexCodeList.string: You can't recall from a player fight!!

Trigger.name: PKed Trigger
Trigger.script: if Bot.active then DoRecovery() end raiseEvent("onForcedMove", "pked") raiseEvent("onPKed")

regexCodeList.string: ## YOU were just defeated in battle by
^You land \[ \d+ of \d+ \] attacks .*$
You lose your focus.
You lose your concentration.
Sit still, someone has bashed you.
You're trying to recover from being tripped first.
You fail your attempt
You're far too stunned for anything right now.
You have failed to recall!
^\[ (.*) \]: Welcome back to Nodeka and thank you for returning!
You may again perform locked last pk abilities.

Trigger.name: Closed Door Trigger
Trigger.script: local doorName = matches[3]:gsub(";",":") local dir = matches[4]:gsub(";",":") raiseEvent("onMoveFail") send("open " .. dir .. "." .. doorName) send(dir)

regexCodeList.string: ^The closed (and locked )?(\w+) block\(s\) your passage (north|east|south|west|up|down)\.$
You may again perform time until next daily prize abilities.
^You are no longer affected by: elementary (left|right) disarm\.$
You may again perform will not grant pk rewards abilities.
You may again perform time until next daily prize abilities.
You lack the
^You pray to recall (.*).You failed\.
You pray to recall
^.* disappears!$
There is no one here by that name.

Trigger.name: Saw Affect Trigger
Trigger.script:
local affect = matches[2]:gsub("^%s*(.-)%s*$", "%1") Player.debug("Saw Affect:"..affect)
if Flag.affects then if affect and affect ~= "" then Player.buffs[affect] = true end end if Follower.affects then if affect and affect ~= "" then Follower.buffs[affect] = true end end

Trigger.name: Saw Prevent Trigger
Trigger.script: if Flag.prevents then local name = matches[2] or "" local days = tonumber(matches[4]) or 0 local hours = tonumber(matches[5]) or 0 local minutes = tonumber(matches[6]) or 0 local seconds = tonumber(matches[7]) or 0 --sawPrevent(name, days, hours, minutes, seconds) if name ~= "" then Prevented(name) end end

regexCodeList.string: ^You cannot perform (.*) abilities again yet \(type 'prevention'\)\.$
[ Personal affects: all ]:
[ Preventions ]:

Trigger.name: Run Percent Trigger
Trigger.script: if Flag.prevents then local p = tonumber(matches[2]) Player.percent = p if p < 150 then Player.salvage.minimum = 3 else Player.salvage.minimum = 10 end end

regexCodeList.string: ^ run time: (\d+)%.*$

Trigger.name: Affect Down Trigger
Trigger.script: BuffDown(matches[2]) if (not Bot.active) and (Player.position ~= "fight") then CheckBuffs() end

regexCodeList.string: ^You are no longer affected by: (.*)\.$

Trigger.name: Prevent Available Trigger
Trigger.script: local prevent = matches[2] or "" if prevent ~= "" then PreventAvailable(prevent) end if not Bot.active and Player.position ~= fight then CheckBuffs() end

regexCodeList.string: ^You may again perform (.*) abilities\.$
^You (give|drop) < salvage >.*$

Trigger.name: Salvage Gnome Start Trigger
Trigger.script: for i = 1, 5 do send("give salvage, scrounger") end send("answer begin") send("inventory")

regexCodeList.string: 'begin': I've handed over some salvage that I'd like you to dissect.

Trigger.name: Salvage Gnome Done
Trigger.script: if Player.salvage.count > 0 then send("follow scrounger") elseif Bot.state == "training" then expandAlias("#puta") expandAlias("go train") expandAlias("trainCommand") end

regexCodeList.string: A scrounger gnome says, 'Thank you for your business,
A scrounger gnome says, 'No valid salvages were received - our time is valuable, please do not waste it.'
^< salvage > .* you carry withers into dust\.$

Trigger.name: Salvage Got Trigger
Trigger.script: local s = tonumber(matches[2]) or 1 Player.salvage.count = Player.salvage.count + s if Player.salvage.count >= 10 then if Bot.active then RecallTrain() end end

regexCodeList.string: ^You get \(?(\d+)?\)? ?< salvage > .*$

Trigger.name: Salvage Inventory Trigger
Trigger.script: if Flag.inventory then local s = tonumber(matches[2]) or 1 Player.salvage.count = Player.salvage.count + s else send("get all.salvage") end

regexCodeList.string: < salvage >
A white wolf's claws begin to move with the speed of lightning!
Okaeli's white wolf's claws begin to move with the speed of lightning!
A white wolf glows with the aura of thunderous striking power.
Okaeli's white wolf glows with the aura of thunderous striking power.
A white wolf focuses his energy into offensive tactics.
Okaeli's white wolf focuses his energy into offensive tactics.
a white wolf orders you to
Okaeli's white wolf orders you to

Trigger.name: Follower Affects Trigger
Trigger.script: registerAnonymousEventHandler("onPoolPrompt", function() Follower.affects = false end, true) if not Bot.active then registerAnonymousEventHandler("onPoolPrompt", "CheckFollower", true) end Follower.affects = true Follower.attempting = false Follower.buffs = {}

regexCodeList.string: [ Personal affects: all ]: Okaeli's white wolf

Trigger.name: Beckoning of the Wolf Trigger
Trigger.script: send("group follower_of_artur") expandAlias("feq") Player.follower = true Follower.buffs = {} BuffUp("beckoning of the wolf")

regexCodeList.string: You beckon and a white wolf responds.

Trigger.name: Beckoning of the Wolf Down Trigger
Trigger.script: BuffDown("beckoning of the wolf") expandAlias("aff") expandAlias("prev") expandAlias("peq") Player.follower = false

regexCodeList.string: The gods hand you the belongings of your follower.

Trigger.name: Beckoning of the Wolf Already Up Trigger

regexCodeList.string: Your mind is not strong enough to control another.
^Okaeli's white wolf is no longer affected by: (.*)\.$

Trigger.name: ReGroup Follower Trigger
Trigger.script: if Player.follower then send("group follower_of_artur") end

regexCodeList.string: You stop following
You disband Okaeli's white wolf.

Alias.name: # Loop Alias
Alias.script:
local i = tonumber(matches[2]) local cmd = matches[3]
for j = 1, i do expandAlias(cmd, true) end

Alias.name: Get Component Alias
Alias.script: local amount = tonumber(matches[3]) or 1 local name = string.trim(matches[4]) or "" Craft.Get(amount, "component", name)

Alias.name: Get Scrap Alias
Alias.script: amount = tonumber(matches[2]) or 1 name = string.trim(matches[3]) or "" Craft.Get(amount, "scraps", name)

Alias.name: Craft Do Trade Alias
Alias.script: local amount = tonumber(matches[3]) or 1 local name = string.trim(matches[4]) or "" Craft.TradeComps(amount, name)

Alias.name: Craft Show Recipe Alias
Alias.script: local t1 = string.trim(matches[3]) or "" local t2 = string.trim(matches[4]) or "" local filter = string.trim(matches[5]) or "" Craft.ShowRecipes(t1, t2, filter)

Alias.name: Craft Short Do Trade Alias
Alias.script: local amount = tonumber(matches[2]) or 1 local name = string.trim(matches[3]) or "" Craft.TradeComps(amount, name)

Alias.name: Craft Short Show Recipe Alias
Alias.script: local t1 = string.trim(matches[2]) or "" local t2 = string.trim(matches[3]) or "" local filter = string.trim(matches[4]) or "" Craft.ShowRecipes(t1, t2, filter)

Alias.name: Craft debug alias
Alias.script: Craft.debugging = not Craft.debugging if Craft.debugging then Craft.echo("debugging on") else Craft.echo("debugging off") end

Alias.name: Map Debug Alias
Alias.script: Map.config.debug = not Map.config.debug Map.echo("Map debug set to: " .. (Map.config.debug and "on" or "off"))

Alias.name: Map Multitag Alias
Alias.script: local tagname = matches[2] or "" local roomID = tonumber(matches[3]) or nil Map.Tag(matches[2], roomID, true)

Alias.name: Set Current Area Name Alias
Alias.script:
local areaID = getRoomArea(Map.currentRoom)
if areaID and matches[2] then setAreaName(areaID, matches[2]) end

Alias.name: Celtic Resilience Alias
Alias.script: local t = matches[2] if t == "f" then t = "fire" elseif t == "fr" then t = "frost" elseif t == "l" then t = "lightning" end Abilities["celtic resilience"].command = "cast 'celtic resilience' "..t send("cast 'celtic resilience' "..t) AddAttack("celtic resilience")

Alias.name: Witching Frostband Alias
Alias.script: local target = matches[2] or "" send("cast 'witching frostband'"..target)

Alias.name: Hex of Menthijan Alias
Alias.script: local target = matches[2] or "" send("invoke 'hex of menthijan'"..target)

Alias.name: Star of the Green Flame Alias
Alias.script: local target = matches[2] or "" send("cast 'star of the green flame'"..target)

Alias.name: Profane Litany Trigger
Alias.script: local target = matches[2] or "" send("cast 'profane litany'"..target)

Alias.name: Distance Attack Alias
Alias.script: local dir = matches[2] send("invoke 'mercurial spirit-lightning' "..dir) send("cast 'chain lightning' "..dir)

Alias.name: Lay Hands Alias
Alias.script: local target = matches[2] or "" send('lay hands '..target)

Alias.name: Holy Light Alias
Alias.script: local target = matches[2] or "" if target ~= "" then target = " "..target end send('holy light'..target)

Alias.name: Antei of Hakanai Shouten Alias
Alias.script: local target = matches[2] or "" send("invoke 'antei of hakanai shouten'"..target)

Alias.name: Glancing Pierce Alias
Alias.script: local target = matches[2] or "" send("glancing pierce"..target)

Alias.name: Strike of the Quiet Art Alias
Alias.script: local target = matches[2] or "" send("strike of the quiet art"..target)

Alias.name: Antei of the Clouded Mind Alias
Put follower eq
Alias.script: eq = { "falia bane", "rusted crown", "shadowed mask", "onyx stud", "onyx stud", "gar", "robe nobility", "warden vest", "katahdin", "sash blood", "sash blood", "rock crusher", "loop swirling darkness", "loop swirling darkness", "fauchard", "fauchard", "nomad sash", "shadow knee band", } for i=1,#eq do send("put "..eq[i]..", alpine") end

Alias.name: Equip follower
Alias.script: send("give alpine, follower_of_artur") send("order follower_of_artur get all, alpine") send("order follower_of_artur wear all")

Alias.name: Follower Remove Eq
Alias.script: send("order follower_of_artur remove all") send("order follower_of_artur put all, alpine") send("order follower_of_artur give alpine, artur")

Alias.name: Attack Alias
Alias.script: local target = matches[2] or "" registerAnonymousEventHandler("onCheckBuffComplete", function() DoAttack(target) end, true) CheckFollower() CheckBuffs()

Alias.name: Short Attack Alias
Alias.script: if Player.position == "fight" then DoAttack(" "..(Player.target or "")) else expandAlias("attack "..Player.target) end

Alias.name: Player Debug Alias
Alias.script: Player.debugging = not Player.debugging if Player.debugging then Player.echo("debugging on") else Player.echo("debugging off") end

Alias.name: Lock Alias
Alias.script: AddAttack("continuum of combat") send("cast 'continuum of combat'"..(Player.target or ""))

Alias.name: Recall Alias
Alias.script: local target = matches[3] or false Player.recall = target if target then send("recall "..target) elseif Player.follower then Player.recall = " follower_of_artur" send("recall follower_of_artur") else send("recall") end

Script.name: Ability List Script
Configuration Script
Script.script:
function NodekaMudletConfig() -- Map triggergroups here -- The key (wlc, bule, etc...) must correspond to the area name you made when you started -- mapping (map start <area name>) and the value ('WLC Triggers', 'Bule Triggers' etc...) -- must correspond to the trigger group in Mudlet Bot.triggerGroups = { wlc = "WLC Triggers", bule = "Bule Triggers", fen = "Fen Triggers", ["wlc camp"] = "WLC Camp Triggers", }
-- Set your crafting bags here <keyword> = {start#, stop#} Craft.bags = { rucksack = {1,45}, explorer = {6,18}, }
-- Set your filter to specify which comps you want to give up for trades -- Whatever matches the filters below will be used for trading unless it -- is in your trade queue. The trades will save one component if you have -- not received a tech in both expertise and artistry in that comp, otherwise -- it will use any that match the filter. Craft.tradeAny = {keep=1,} -- Tier 1 - Trade everything Craft.tradeAny[1] = {keep=1,material = {"metal","cloth","wood","leather"}} -- Tier 2 - Trade everything Craft.tradeAny[2] = {keep=1,material = {"metal","cloth","wood","leather"}} -- Tier 3 - Trade any wood and any of the listed components Craft.tradeAny[3] = { material = {"wood"}, components = { "galvanic alloy", "limpid iron", "siren-steel", "dewstrand", "sable silk", "irongrowth", "whip-wing beech", "lustrous silver pelt", "phytoderm husk", "spored lamella", "cinderhide", }}
-- When calculating components to use for trading you can either use up -- more valuable components first, which would maximize the overall number -- of trades you can accomplish, or you can use up least valuable components -- first which frees up more inventory space. The default is to use up less -- valuable components first. Craft.startLow = true
-- If you want to trade using smiles then you need to ensure that you set -- your smile value before doing trades using the '#craft smile <num>' alias -- If you don't want to use smiles then disable them below Craft.useSmile = true Craft.smiles = 0
end
function OrderBuff(buff) send("order follower_of_artur "..buff) send("order follower_of_artur order artur "..buff) Follower.attempting = buff end
function CheckFollower() if not Player.follower then return end if Follower.attempting then return end for _, buff in ipairs(Follower.buffsWanted) do if not Follower.buffs[buff] then OrderBuff(buff) return end end end
function PlayerConfig() Follower = {} Follower.attempting = false Follower.buffsWanted = { "concentrated attack", "thunderous strike", "lightning strike", } Follower.buffs = {} Player.minAlign = -149 Player.maxAlign = 149 Player.isNotAlign = true Player.salvage.minimum = 5 Player.empower = "kyf" Player.recall = false Player.follower = true Player.buffsWanted = { "forgetful fire", "archers competence", "radical defiance", "valkyrie's agility", "beckoning of the wolf", "okaeli's cloak", } Player.startCombos["run"] = { "the ruining song", "prayer of the gods disfavor", "fireball", } Player.fightCombos["run"] = { "the ruining song", "prayer of the gods disfavor", "fireball", } Player.startCombos["pk"] = { "banded smiting initiative", "alluring grace", "prayer of the gods disfavor", "glancing pierce", "striking fist", "one of four, pivot", "ashi barai kick", "the ruining song", "bash", "beguile", } Player.fightCombos["pk"] = { "alluring grace", "prayer of the gods disfavor", "glancing pierce", "striking fist", "one of four, pivot", "ashi barai kick", "the ruining song", "bash", "beguile", } SetCombo("run")
-- This shows the status of your skills in the status window -- The key ("Cloak", etc...) is the flag you will see in the window -- the value ("okaeli's cloak") is the skill name you want to monitor. Player.skill_status = { ["Cloak"] = "okaeli's cloak", ["Prayer"] = "prayer of the gods disfavor", ["Song"] = "the ruining song", ["Grace"] = "alluring grace", } return end
-- Filter ability restrictions here, e.g. if you need to check pools before -- casting, or you want to wait for certain flags to use a skill, add them in this -- function AbilityReady = function(a) Player.debug("AbilityReady:"..a..":") if (a == "fireball") and (Player.mp <= 2000) then return "rage" end --if (a == "meijin's blindfold") and (Player.sp <= 19000) then -- return false --end return Abilities[a].command end PlayerConfig() NodekaMudletConfig()

Script.name: GUI Windows Script
Script.script:
ChatC = Adjustable.Container:new({ name = "ChatC", titleText = " ", y=0, x=0, height = "20c", width = "-40c", autoLoad = false, autoSave = false, adjLabelstyle = "background-color:rgba(0,0,0,100%); border: 1px solid green;", buttonstyle=[[ QLabel{ background-color: rgba(0,0,0,100%);} ]], })
StatusC = Adjustable.Container:new({ name = "StatusC", titleText = " ", y=0, x="-40c", height = "20c", width="40c", autoLoad = false, autoSave = false, adjLabelstyle = "background-color:rgba(0,0,0,100%); border: 1px solid green;", buttonstyle=[[ QLabel{ background-color: rgba(0,0,0,100%);} ]], })
MapC = Adjustable.Container:new({ name = "MapC", titleText = " ", x="-40c", y="40c", height = "20c", width="40c", autoLoad = false, autoSave = false, adjLabelstyle = "background-color:rgba(0,0,0,100%); border: 1px solid green;", buttonstyle=[[ QLabel{ background-color: rgba(0,0,0,100%);} ]], })
OverheadC = Adjustable.Container:new({ name = "OverheadC", titleText = " ", y="20c", x="-40c", height = "20c", width="40c", autoLoad = false, autoSave = false, adjLabelstyle = "border: 1px solid green;", buttonstyle=[[ QLabel{ background-color: rgba(0,0,0,100%);} ]], })
ChatC:attachToBorder("top") StatusC:attachToBorder("right")
chatConsole = Geyser.MiniConsole:new({ name="chatConsole", x=0, y=0, autoWrap=true, color="black", scrollBar=true, fontSize=8, height="100%", width="100%", }, ChatC)
mapWindow = Geyser.Mapper:new({ name = "my_mapper", x=0, y=0, width="99%", height="99%" }, MapC)
statusConsole = Geyser.MiniConsole:new({ name="statusConsole", x=0, y=0, width="100%", height="100%", autoWrap=false, color="black", scrollBar=false, }, StatusC)
overheadConsole = Geyser.MiniConsole:new({ name="overheadConsole", x=0, y=0, height="18c", width="38c", autoWrap=false, color="black", scrollBar=false, fontSize=8, }, OverheadC)

Script.name: GUI Capture Script
Script.script:
function CaptureChat(s) local time = getTime(true, "HH:mm:ss") local str = s or ""
if str ~= "" then str = "<gray>"..time.." "..str chatConsole:cecho(str.."\n") else selectCurrentLine() copy() chatConsole:cecho(time.." ") appendBuffer("chatConsole") end end

Script.name: GUI Overhead Map Script
Script.script:
extendedMap = true
local lineTarget = 18 if not extendedMap then lineTarget = 16 end
createBuffer("obuff") lineNum = 0 function MapLine() lineNum = lineNum + 1 selectCurrentLine() copy() appendBuffer("obuff") deleteLine()
if lineNum >= lineTarget then clearWindow("overheadConsole") for i=1, lineTarget do moveCursor("obuff", 0, 0) selectCurrentLine("obuff") copy("obuff") appendBuffer("overheadConsole") deleteLine("obuff") end lineNum = 0 clearWindow("obuff") end end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("onExits", function() lineNum = 0 end) registerAnonymousEventHandler("onPools", function() lineNum = 0 end)

Script.name: GUI Status Script
Script.script:
function StatusUpdate() local runppm = Counter.runGPM() / 20000 local runxpm = Counter.runXPM() / 1000000 local totalppm = Counter.totalGPM() / 20000 local totalxpm = Counter.totalXPM() / 1000000 local totalplat = Counter.totalGold / 20000 local totalexp = Counter.totalExp / 1000000 local runplat = Counter.runGold / 20000 local runexp = Counter.runExp / 1000000 local tottime = getStopWatchTime(TotalCounterStopWatch) local tots = tottime % 60 local totm = (tottime / 60) % 60 local toth = (tottime / 3600) % 60 local runtime = getStopWatchTime(RunCounterStopWatch) local runs = runtime % 60 local runm = (runtime / 60) % 60 local runh = (runtime / 3600)
clearWindow("statusConsole") local str = string.format("<LightBlue>Tick: <white>%d", Tick()) statusConsole:cecho(str) str = string.format("

<LightBlue>Total
<white>PPM: <gold>%-9d <white>XPM:<PaleGreen>%d
<white>Plat:<gold>%-9d <white>XP: <PaleGreen>%d
<white>Time:<green>%02d:%02d:%02d
", totalppm, totalxpm, totalplat, totalexp, toth, totm, tots) statusConsole:cecho(str) str = string.format("
<LightBlue>Segment
<white>PPM: <gold>%-9d <white>XPM:<PaleGreen>%d
<white>Plat:<gold>%-9d <white>XP: <PaleGreen>%d
<white>Salvage:<green>%d
<white>Time:<green>%02d:%02d:%02d
", runppm, runxpm, runplat, runexp, Player.salvage.count, runh, runm, runs) statusConsole:cecho(str) str = SkillStatus() statusConsole:cecho("
"..str)
if Craft.tradestatus then statusConsole:cecho(Craft.tradestatus) end end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("onBotStart", "ResetRunCounter") registerAnonymousEventHandler("onSecond", "StatusUpdate")
